_header: On days when I am called to the school
_description: Ffulgens scola discolus est menator pessimus — five cross-rhymed quatrains (abab) plus burden (cc): ‘Frangens scola disculus / est mercator pessimus’

BLAdd14997.First Lines:
On days when I am callit to þe scole de matre et materteraThen
                    my hert begynnys to cole languescunt mentes vicera…
BLAdd14997.Last Lines:
…ffelo be gladde & make gud chere dolentes cum
                    tripudiisffor all men schall nott thryfe to here que exibentur
                    studiis
BLAdd14997.Editions:
Hammerle,  Karl. 
             “Verstreute me und frühne Lyrik.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         166 (1935): 195-204: 203-4.

BLAdd60577.First Lines:
A mornyngis when I am callide to scoleDe matre vel
                    materia…
BLAdd60577.Last Lines:
…ffor all wee schall nott thryve to yereQui exhibemur
                        studio
BLAdd60577.Facsimiles:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             “Introduction.” 
             The Winchester Anthology. A Facsimile of British Library Additional
                Manuscript 60577. With an account of the music by 
                    Iain
                    Fenlon. 
         Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1981.
